commit_message: Update README.md
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/genetronhealth/uvc-delins
No longer show each set of simple variants constituting a haplotype to stderr.

Added defaultB (default variant buffer block size) to prevent the situation that two or more alignments are equivalent but the alignment with less support is used, reducing the signal of the other alignment (resolve ambiguity between different alignments). No longer generate log messages for most skipped variants.
Skip variants outside ROI ASAP. And added more diagnotic msgs.
Fixed mis-info in bin/uvcvcf-raw2delins-all.sh
Update README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md
More diagnostic error msg on assertionError. Let tDP be tAD[0] +tAD[1]. Removed old tbDP and tDP. Updated to version 0.1.6.
Update README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md

Fixed a corner-case assertion-error. Let the cmd-line param parsing respond to the -h (help) and -v (version) flags. Standardized the format of version string to (major.minor.minorMinor.commitID). Updated version to 0.1.5.
Updated to version 0.1.4.
Create makefile.yml
Added .travis.yml
Added github URL to UVC.
Added (a) the clarification about the fact that haplotype info was given by UVC and (b) the recommendation for using UVC in REAME.md
Changed UVC to UVC-delins in the README
Refactored code to automate the generation of VCF/FORMAT tags.

Changed the vcf tag prefix t into di (except that tHap is changed into delinsHap for better clarity at first glance). Generate more user-friendly error message when the sequence records in the FASTA and VCF files do not match with each other. Put delinsVariantCaller info more at the end in the VCF header to better maintain compatiblity with very old versions of pysam. Now generate (*RDM and *RDm) files. Updated to version 0.1.3.
Fixed a compiling error due to arrays not downgraded to primitiives yet. Fixed a compiler warning when the FASTA and VCF files have different template sequences.

Please note that this commit is not backward compatible due to changes to the VCF tags. The reason for such changes is due to the fact that this program is not just used for tumor sequencing data. For example, this program may be run on healthy germline variants and still generate biologically meaningful delins variants. Hence, the prefix t is very misleading. Additionally, the ADR can be changed into AD for better resemblance with the naming in VCF specs and GATK.
Please also note that many VCF tags have Number=A not Number=R mainly due to the pecularity of delins variant ALT alleles compared with the wild-type REF alleles.

Updated to version 0.1.3.

Fixed the problem that stderr is written to input vcf in uvcvcf-raw2delins-all.sh
Updated to version 0.1.2
Updated the README.md to clearly indicate that UVC already stored each haplotype and its information.
Generate time (wall-clock and CPU times) info and updated version to 0.1.1
Updated the README.md with more info and updated version to 0.1.0
Added assertions to vcf_close.
Fixed the cmd-line help buggy msg with -2 being displayed instead of -3.
Added a short README modified from the README of UVC.
Fixed bash-binary-file error. Rename uvc-rawvcf2hapvcf into uvcvcf-raw2delins.
Fixed the issue that already indexed vcf.gz gives error (now the script is idempotent).
Fixed the small issue that bcftools returns index error for indexing vcf.gz that has already been indexed
Update DEFAULT_C2 from 0.6 to 0.5 to prevent simple variants from being consumed for complex variants made of three and more simple-variants.
do not merge VCF records of the same type in bcftools merge.
renamed rawvcf2allvcf to rawvcf2allvcfs
Reverted the previous change and added the updates to tADRmin_overall and tADRmin_overall.
Remove more false positive simple variants that remain after generating delins variants.

Added -2 and -3 params to cmd line to prevent the false positive generation of simple variants that are totally used tto generate the delins variant.

Fixed a compiling error.
Fixed the bug where the complex var consisting of 3-simple-vars is generated.
Fixed error with assertion on vcf_write_ret and write header too.
Fixed seg-faults.
Added cv_qual to VCF INFO and now let the QUAL be the min of cv_qual (min of simple vars) and hv_qual (hap linkage var qual).
Added -D option that generates output in non_delins_outvcf.
By default, generate simple variants only if these variants were used to generate delins variants. Changed complex to delins in the code.
Fixed wrong the usage of PHONY in the Makefile.
Generate VCF containing simple variants used to construct complex variants. Added -H and -A params to the cmdline. Reformatted cmd-line help messsage with alphabetical ordering of params.
Added the deploy target in the Makefile
Changed exe name from uvc-rawvcf2hapvcf.out into uvc-rawvcf2hapvcf
generate complexVariantDate, complexVariantCallerVersion, and complexVariantCallerCommand in the header of the output VCF.
Fixed a compiling error.

Put tHap into cmdline args with -h param (cannot be overriden in the bed file), split tDP into tDPm (min) and tDPM (max), compute tHVQ (tumor haplotype variant quality) with a default power-law exponent of 3, fixed a warning, prevent an extremely unlikely situation of overflow in the computation of tHVQ.

Added tADA, tADRm (replace tADR), and tAD2F into INFO. Fixed the bug where tDPmin and tADRmin initially set to are ze initially set to zero instead of INT_MAX. Fixed the bug where -T is not set in cmdline.
Removed the -b param and reordered the -T param to be after the -B -O -E params on the cmd line.
Removed space in VCF INFO field.

Added allele fractions. Added VariantInfo class to simplify code. Made InDels symmetrical in the merging steps. Added -SLR flags for enabling short-tandem-repeat (STR) adjustments, disabling left trimming,  and disabling right trimming. Added tDP, tADR, tADRM INFO fields. Use R3X2 in the input VCF for STR adjustments (even if adjustment is not enabled). Generate min QUAL as the QUAL for the MNV or complex variant.
Used varlen2reflen, enable_short_tandem_repeat_adjust, posleft, and posright.
Updated Makefile and install-dependencies.sh to use htslib 1.13. And make debug version too.
Use mismatch, gap open, and gap extension scores to merge simple variants into complex variants. Right-trim variants.
Added install-dependencies.sh, made changes to Makefile accordingly, and added cmdline params to the main program.
First commit, code is working now.
